name: crystarkWP
body:
###Hello
My name is Davis Hoang, I'm from Vietnam and I am a student of University of Science in HCMC. CrystarkWP is one of my very first Wordpress Research Theme Developing Project. I used this theme as a blog to test and post some 3D Graphic Product that I created for my clients. CrystarkWP is more like a Portfolio to me. If you like my theme, download and test it. Here is the link to my site [CrystarkWP](http://crystark.16mb.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
